name: Open with iTerm2
description: Support you to launch iTerm2 directly and use it to open a file or folder instantly rather than take more time to launch iTerm2 from Finder. If you haven't installed iTerm2, it will help you quickly get the iTerm2 installer and guide you to complete the installation step-by-step.

apps.name: iTerm2
apps.description: Support you to launch iTerm2 directly and use it to open a file or folder instantly rather than take more time to launch iTerm2 from Finder. If you haven't installed iTerm2, it will help you quickly get the iTerm2 installer and guide you to complete the installation step-by-step.

subname: Quickly open the target file or folder with iTerm2.
